name: Curivari - Reserva Limitada Cafe Noir - No. 54
additionalNotes: Curivari Reserva Limitada Cafe Noir is the maduro option of the Reserva Limitada Cafe. These dark brown beauties are made with only the most authentic Cuban-seed Nicaraguan Criollo and Corojo tobaccos. Medium to full-bodied in construction, you will taste fudge, spice, vanilla, nuts and earthiness providing for a fabulous Cuban cigar.
